programme.title: Takut Ke Tak
programme.desc: Lima pelajar jurusan filem merancang untuk melakukan penggambaran di sebuah rumah berhantu, namun satu demi satu kejadian yang sama seperti kebanyakan filem seram berlaku kepada mereka lalu mereka perlu membuat keputusan penting takut ke tak?

programme.title: Dendam Sarakit Ep 4 Ep4
programme.desc: Dina diminta Mariam untuk menggoda Rafiq dan berkahwin dengannya. Semasa keluar makan malam dengan Dina, Rafiq ternampak bayang Sarakit dalam kereta. Pada malam yang sama, Mariam sekali lagi diganggu penjelmaan Sarakit dan Mariam berada dalam ketakutan. Mariam mendesak Rafiq meninggalkan Sarakit yang dikatakan mengamalkan ilmu sihir. Rafiq enggan mempercayai kata-kata ibunya dan pulang ke Sarakit. Di rumah, Sarakit tidak kelihatan dan Rafiq berihat di sofa setelah membeli bahanbahan makanan. Sarakit telah memasak untuk Rafiq dan mengingatkan Rafiq janjinya iaitu tidak akan meninggalkan Sarakit. Sarakit kemudiannya menuduh Rafiq berlaku curang dan Rafiq menafikannya. Rafiq menyakinkan Sarakit bahawa dia hanya mencintai Sarakit seorang sahaja. Rafiq terjaga dan mendapati apa yang berlaku antaranya dan Sarakit hanyalah mimpi

programme.title: Bohsia 2: Jalan Kembali
programme.desc: Filem ini merupakan sekuel kepada "Bohsia: Jangan Pilih Jalan Hitam" pada tahun 2009. Syamsul Yusof kembali mengarahkan kisah hidup seorang bohsia yang dilakonkan oleh Nabila Huda. Tasha (Nabila Huda) adalah seorang gadis yang dibesarkan tanpa keluarga dan pendidikan, memaksanya untuk mencari perlindungan di dunia bawah tanah, di kalangan samseng jalanan. Dia tidak lama kemudian menjadi bosan dengan kehidupannya yang tidak bermakna, tetapi jalannya menuju penebusan adalah jalan yang diturap dengan banyak halangan.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak
programme.desc: Sekumpulan anak muda yang menggelarkan diri mereka Puaka X gemar pergi ke beberapa tempat yang dikatakan berhantu. Mereka menggunakan pendekatan berbeza daripada kumpulan paranormal yang lain. Semakin hari, Puaka X semakin galak mencabar sesiapa di luar sana untuk membuktikan kewujudan hantu. Pada suatu hari mereka menerima cabaran daripada seseorang yang tidak dikenali untuk pergi ke lokasi bernama Balai Gombak. Tanpa disedari, ada sesuatu yang menanti mereka di sana.

programme.title: Duhai Si Pari Pari
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Syadon, seorang pemuda yang mencintai Mala. Pada suatu hari, Syadon bertemu seorang gadis bernama Pari yang sedang mencari kekasihnya. Semakin hari, Pari semakin suntuk waktu yang Pari ada untuk mengahwini jejaka idamannya dan pulang ke dunia kayangan. Syadon bertanya siapakah Pari yang sebenarnya dan setelah diterangkan, dia sukar mempercayainya. Pari terpaksa membuktikan kata-katanya dengan menunaikan permintaan Syadon.

programme.title: Ular
programme.desc: Myra ialah seorang wartawan jenayah yang digantung kerja telah diarahkan untuk membuat liputan di sebuah pusat peranginan di sebuah pulau. Dia yang ditemani jurukameranya, Remy tidak pernah menyangka tugasannya kali ini bukanlah satu tugasan biasa apabila percutian hebat yang dimenangi oleh 10 orang pemenang cabutan bertuah bertukar menjadi sebuah mimpi ngeri. Segalanya bermula apabila ada di antara tetamu pusat peranginan itu dengan beraninya telah menyelinap masuk ke dalam hutan yang telah dipagari dengan pagar elektrik. Rambo yang panik setelah menyedari hal tersebut segera mendapatkan Encik Aziz, pemilik pusat peranginan tersebut. Ia secara tidak langsung telah menimbulkan rasa ingin tahu Myra dan Remy untuk merungkai apakah rahsia yang cuba disembunyikan oleh Encik Aziz di sebalik kewujudan pusat peranginan tersebut.

programme.title: Anita Dunia Ajaib
programme.desc: Rumahtangga Amir dan Asmah berubah setelah mereka didatangi seorang pembantu rumah misteri yang membantu mendapatkan mereka cahaya mata. Selepas melahirkan anak dalam tempoh yang singkat, satu demi satu insiden aneh menimpa ahli keluarga dan kenalan mereka.

programme.title: Anak Niat
programme.desc: Juita dipanggil anak niat yang ditatah penuh kasih sayang oleh ibu dan bapanya, Orang Kaya dan Faridah. Ibu dan bapa Juita bernazar kepada Keramat untuk mendapatkan seorang anak iaitu Juita namun tidak mahu menerima kenyataan bahawa perbuatan itu adalah syirik. Juita kemudian menjalinkan hubungan bersama Jidot. Abang Mat pula sedih kerana sering dipandang hina oleh Orang Kaya dan Juita hanya kerana dia seorang pembantu yang diupah oleh mereka. Kebenaran terbongkar apabila Abang Mat ialah bapa kepada Jidot dan juga Juita.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak
programme.desc: Sekumpulan anak muda yang menggelarkan diri mereka Puaka X gemar pergi ke beberapa tempat yang dikatakan berhantu. Mereka menggunakan pendekatan berbeza daripada kumpulan paranormal yang lain. Semakin hari, Puaka X semakin galak mencabar sesiapa di luar sana untuk membuktikan kewujudan hantu. Pada suatu hari mereka menerima cabaran daripada seseorang yang tidak dikenali untuk pergi ke lokasi bernama Balai Gombak. Tanpa disedari, ada sesuatu yang menanti mereka di sana.

programme.title: Jin Notti
programme.desc: Segala yang berlaku dalam dunia jin akan bertentangan dengan alam manusia. Notti, seekor anak jin dihukum kerana sering membuat keburukan dalam dunianya. Hukuman yang dijatuhkan kepadanya ialah dia perlu turun ke bumi dan untuk bergaul dengan orang-orang jahat. Ketika berada di bumi, Notti perlu masuk ke dalam tubuh manusia dan membuat kejahatan namun dia sering gagal. Lebih merumitkan keadaan, Notti mula jatuh cinta dengan seorang lelaki bernama Aziz.

programme.title: Magika
programme.desc: Mengisahkan dua beradik, Ayu dan Malik yang tersesat di alam bunian selepas keluar rumah pada waktu maghrib. Ayu berhadapan dengan ujian sukar untuk menyelamatkan adiknya Malik yang diculik nenek kebayan. Walau bagaimanapun, Ayu bernasib baik kerana dia bertemu dengan Badang yang membantu menyelamatkan mereka keluar dari dunia asing itu.

programme.title: Anak Niat
programme.desc: Juita dipanggil anak niat yang ditatah penuh kasih sayang oleh ibu dan bapanya, Orang Kaya dan Faridah. Ibu dan bapa Juita bernazar kepada Keramat untuk mendapatkan seorang anak iaitu Juita namun tidak mahu menerima kenyataan bahawa perbuatan itu adalah syirik. Juita kemudian menjalinkan hubungan bersama Jidot. Abang Mat pula sedih kerana sering dipandang hina oleh Orang Kaya dan Juita hanya kerana dia seorang pembantu yang diupah oleh mereka. Kebenaran terbongkar apabila Abang Mat ialah bapa kepada Jidot dan juga Juita.

programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Selepas kematian Datuk Pangeran Abdul Rahman, waris-warisnya dipanggil untuk mendengar wasiat yang ditulisnya. Harta peninggalannya sebanyak RM30 juta akan dibahagikan kepada Azlee, Mazlan, Saiful serta isteri mudanya, Ratana Putri, seorang wanita Thailand. Azlee tidak puas hati sebab tak mahu berkongsi harta dengan pewaris lain. Lalu berlakulah pertengkaran kecil antara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Puri. Peguam arwah Datuk Pangeran menjelaskan terdapat syarat untuk memiliki harta tersebut, iaitu kesemua waris-waris diminta untuk menetap di banglo besar itu selama 33 hari. Dalam ketegangan yangg berlaku diantara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Putri, tiba-tiba mereka dikejutkan dengan kehadiran pontianak di banglo tersebut.

programme.title: Duhai Si Pari Pari
programme.desc: Mengisahkan Syadon, seorang pemuda yang mencintai Mala. Pada suatu hari, Syadon bertemu seorang gadis bernama Pari yang sedang mencari kekasihnya. Semakin hari, Pari semakin suntuk waktu yang Pari ada untuk mengahwini jejaka idamannya dan pulang ke dunia kayangan. Syadon bertanya siapakah Pari yang sebenarnya dan setelah diterangkan, dia sukar mempercayainya. Pari terpaksa membuktikan kata-katanya dengan menunaikan permintaan Syadon.

programme.title: Brainscan: Aku Dan Topi Ajaib
programme.desc: Adruce, seorang budak yang kuat berangan dan sering tidur dalam kelas. Pada suatu hari, Adruce membawa pulang sebuah alat berbentuk topi yang dijumpainya di dalam semak. Tanpa pengetahun Adruce, alat itu adalah sebuah mesin yang boleh membaca fikiran manusia yang dicuri daripada makmal Dr. Suzana. Pelbagai kejadian berlaku selepas Adruce memakai topi itu sehingga dia perlu membetulkan semula keadaan yang telah berubah.

programme.title: Anita Dunia Ajaib
programme.desc: Rumahtangga Amir dan Asmah berubah setelah mereka didatangi seorang pembantu rumah misteri yang membantu mendapatkan mereka cahaya mata. Selepas melahirkan anak dalam tempoh yang singkat, satu demi satu insiden aneh menimpa ahli keluarga dan kenalan mereka.

programme.title: Perjanjian Syaitan
programme.desc: Tambun membunuh Tok Kadim, penghulu di sebuah kampung dan kemudiannya mengatakan bahawa Tok Kadim mati satu kemalangan. Selepas kejadian itu, Tambun dilantik menjadi ketua kampung yang baharu. Pada masa yang sama, Ribut, adik kepada Tambun yang berwajah hodoh ingin membalas dendam kepada Ujang kerana menolak cintanya dan memilih Seri sebagai teman. Ribut bersahabat dengan syaitan yang berjanji untuk menjadikannya seorang perempuan cantik. Sejak itulah Ribut berusaha untuk membalas dendam sehingga berlaku beberapa siri kematian yang penuh misteri.

programme.title: 2 Alam
programme.desc: Amy(Adam) melanjutkan pengajiannya di London. Semasa berada di sana, dia terpengaruh dengan budaya barat. Dia sanggup membuat pembedahan menukar jantina dan berkahwin dengan seorang lelaki Inggeris. Sekian lama membuat dosa, Amy(Adam) akhirnya nekad untuk mengambil nyawanya sendiri. Perjalanan terakhir Adam menuju liang lahad menjadi sukar dengan kejadian pelbagai peristiwa aneh.

programme.title: Seru
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang sebuah produksi yang sedang membuat satu penggambaran filem seram bertajuk "Jangan Bernafas". Semasa penggambaran berlangsung, secara tiba-tiba, pelbagai kejadian aneh dan peristiwa berlaku, diluar jangkaan mereka. Pada mulanya, mereka menganggap ia hanyalah rasukan biasa dan kru di sebalik pembikinan filem tersebut, ingin menjadikannya sebagai "footage" menarik untuk tujuan promosi filem tersebut. Namun, seorang demi seorang menjadi sasaran rasukan dan juga pembunuhan, menyebabkan keadaan menjadi tidak terkawal... tetapi kamera yang digunakan, masih terus merakamkan aksi yang terjadi.

programme.title: Ular
programme.desc: Myra ialah seorang wartawan jenayah yang digantung kerja telah diarahkan untuk membuat liputan di sebuah pusat peranginan di sebuah pulau. Dia yang ditemani jurukameranya, Remy tidak pernah menyangka tugasannya kali ini bukanlah satu tugasan biasa apabila percutian hebat yang dimenangi oleh 10 orang pemenang cabutan bertuah bertukar menjadi sebuah mimpi ngeri. Segalanya bermula apabila ada di antara tetamu pusat peranginan itu dengan beraninya telah menyelinap masuk ke dalam hutan yang telah dipagari dengan pagar elektrik. Rambo yang panik setelah menyedari hal tersebut segera mendapatkan Encik Aziz, pemilik pusat peranginan tersebut. Ia secara tidak langsung telah menimbulkan rasa ingin tahu Myra dan Remy untuk merungkai apakah rahsia yang cuba disembunyikan oleh Encik Aziz di sebalik kewujudan pusat peranginan tersebut.

programme.title: Jin Notti
programme.desc: Segala yang berlaku dalam dunia jin akan bertentangan dengan alam manusia. Notti, seekor anak jin dihukum kerana sering membuat keburukan dalam dunianya. Hukuman yang dijatuhkan kepadanya ialah dia perlu turun ke bumi dan untuk bergaul dengan orang-orang jahat. Ketika berada di bumi, Notti perlu masuk ke dalam tubuh manusia dan membuat kejahatan namun dia sering gagal. Lebih merumitkan keadaan, Notti mula jatuh cinta dengan seorang lelaki bernama Aziz.

programme.title: Puaka Balai Gombak
programme.desc: Sekumpulan anak muda yang menggelarkan diri mereka Puaka X gemar pergi ke beberapa tempat yang dikatakan berhantu. Mereka menggunakan pendekatan berbeza daripada kumpulan paranormal yang lain. Semakin hari, Puaka X semakin galak mencabar sesiapa di luar sana untuk membuktikan kewujudan hantu. Pada suatu hari mereka menerima cabaran daripada seseorang yang tidak dikenali untuk pergi ke lokasi bernama Balai Gombak. Tanpa disedari, ada sesuatu yang menanti mereka di sana.

programme.title: Seru
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang sebuah produksi yang sedang membuat satu penggambaran filem seram bertajuk "Jangan Bernafas". programme.title: Magika
programme.desc: Mengisahkan dua beradik, Ayu dan Malik yang tersesat di alam bunian selepas keluar rumah pada waktu maghrib. Ayu berhadapan dengan ujian sukar untuk menyelamatkan adiknya Malik yang diculik nenek kebayan. Walau bagaimanapun, Ayu bernasib baik kerana dia bertemu dengan Badang yang membantu menyelamatkan mereka keluar dari dunia asing itu.

programme.title: Perjanjian Syaitan
programme.desc: Tambun membunuh Tok Kadim, penghulu di sebuah kampung dan kemudiannya mengatakan bahawa Tok Kadim mati satu kemalangan. Selepas kejadian itu, Tambun dilantik menjadi ketua kampung yang baharu. Pada masa yang sama, Ribut, adik kepada Tambun yang berwajah hodoh ingin membalas dendam kepada Ujang kerana menolak cintanya dan memilih Seri sebagai teman. Ribut bersahabat dengan syaitan yang berjanji untuk menjadikannya seorang perempuan cantik. Sejak itulah Ribut berusaha untuk membalas dendam sehingga berlaku beberapa siri kematian yang penuh misteri.

programme.title: Pontianak Menjerit
programme.desc: Selepas kematian Datuk Pangeran Abdul Rahman, waris-warisnya dipanggil untuk mendengar wasiat yang ditulisnya. Harta peninggalannya sebanyak RM30 juta akan dibahagikan kepada Azlee, Mazlan, Saiful serta isteri mudanya, Ratana Putri, seorang wanita Thailand. Azlee tidak puas hati sebab tak mahu berkongsi harta dengan pewaris lain. Lalu berlakulah pertengkaran kecil antara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Puri. Peguam arwah Datuk Pangeran menjelaskan terdapat syarat untuk memiliki harta tersebut, iaitu kesemua waris-waris diminta untuk menetap di banglo besar itu selama 33 hari. Dalam ketegangan yangg berlaku diantara Azlee, Saiful dan Ratana Putri, tiba-tiba mereka dikejutkan dengan kehadiran pontianak di banglo tersebut.

programme.title: Sarawak Panorama S2 Ep6
programme.desc: A country without a documentary is like a family without an album. Sarawak Panorama is the family album that my team and I whole heartedly and passionately dedicate to our beloved Sarawak.

programme.title: Menghilir Rajang S1 Ep7
programme.desc: Kehidupan penduduk yang tinggal di sepanjang sungai Rajang, Sarawak. Kedudukan geografinya yang strategik menjadikan sungai ini sebagai sumber ekonomi, pendidikan, perhubungan dan produk pelancongan

programme.title: Gawai Bidayuh Ep2
programme.desc: A documentary series exploring the Bidayuh's Gawai Festivals in KUCHING & SERIAN regions, aims to uncover the true meaning of Gawai across borders, revealing the deeper significance of Bidayuh Gawai.

programme.title: Suara Alam Borneo Ep8
programme.desc: Suara Alam Borneo akan mengupasnya hutan hujan tropika berusia jutaan tahun secara terperinci dengan pelbagai spesis flora dan juga fauna menerusi informasi yang mudah difahami.

programme.title: Khazanah Kenyalang Ep13
programme.desc: Sebuah siri dokumentari 13 episod tentang koleksi dan artifak berharga dan sangat penting; yang kini menjadi KHAZANAH NEGERI SARAWAK dan berada dalam simpanan MUZIUM NEGERI SARAWAK.

programme.title: A Day With Champion S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Documentary of six athletes in variant of sports, at different stages in their careers. It lifts the curtain on how difficult and competitive it is to find place in international sports today.

programme.title: Kedey Kita S2 Ep16
programme.desc: Orden Syam will use a food truck to visit local entrepreneurs outside Kuching city, such as Sibu, Sarikei, Sri Aman, Kapit, and Betong, helping them promote their businesses and offer exclusive promotions.

programme.title: Inside Out Ep3
programme.desc: Mengisahkan tentang sejarah gua Niah. Gua tersebut terletak di hutan tropika dan merupakan habitat kepada beberapa spesies. Kawasan ini juga merupakan satu destinasi pelancong untuk pencinta alam.

programme.title: Jom Camping Ep6
programme.desc: Program travelog yang meneroka pelbagai bentuk dan jenis perkhemahan berbeza selain berjalan ke lokasilokasi perkhemahan di negeri Sarawak bersama dua anak jati Sarawak, El Baharin dan Anaz Zawawi.

programme.title: Cigu! Nadai Bisi Utai Ep9
programme.desc: Halim, seorang guru muda lepasan maktab berusia 25 tahun dari Selangor, dilema menerima tawaran mengajar di sekolah rendah di pedalaman Sarawak. Ibu dan tunang menentang, tetapi bapanya menyokong.

programme.title: Design Nation Ep12
programme.desc: Design Nation is a serial TV magazine that documents the architecture of buildings by well-renowned architects that have won various awards locally and internationally.

programme.title: Sarawak Angler Ep3
programme.desc: Program realiti memancing laut dalam di perairan Sarawak diadakan bagi menduga dan mencari spesies ikan hebat.Pemancing profesional dari Sarawak telah dipilih untuk bertanding dalam program realiti ini.

programme.title: (L) Berita TVS@7
programme.desc: Berita TVS membawakan berita yang menyeluruh dan padat dengan perspektif yang lebihmenyegarkan.

programme.title: Hustle Hasil S4 Ep8

programme.title: Nature XCO & Downhill Ep10
programme.desc: Program pertandingan sukan basikal lasak yang dianjurkan oleh Broad Vision Solution Sdn.Bhd dengan kerjasama Persatuan Basikal Sarawak dan Sarawak Sports Cooperation bersama Kerajaan Negeri Sarawak.

programme.title: Khemah Kita Bah Ep3
programme.desc: Program ini dianggap sebagai "camping for dummies", dimana hos dan rakannya akan memberi dan menunjukkan tip-tip asas berkhemah, larangan dan langkah-langkah yang perlu diambil serta pendekatan memasak "outdoor" yang ringkas.

programme.title: In Search of The Food Preserves Ep4
programme.desc: With 6 ethnic groups of Sarawak represented, the host brings out the particularities of each and every one of them, sharing the cross-pollinating nature of our diverse culinary cultures.

programme.title: The Cloth Story S2 Ep8
programme.desc: The Cloth Story season 2 focuses on textiles, such as Pua, Songket, Tenun, Batik and Keringkam from the Borneo region. The cloth, the raw materials, the artisans, the history, the evolution and so much more.

programme.desc: Seorang perempuan indonesia datang ke kuala lumpur mengikut suaminya. Setelah berada di kuala lumpur dia berhasrat untuk bekerja di syarikat milik rakan suaminya. Majikannya itu merupakan seorang yang memiliki sikap dan perangai yang membuatnya sentiasa berada dalam keadaan serba salah dan tertekan. Sikap majikannya yang tidak mahu membayar hutang, menuduhnya mengambil wang syarikat dan tidak membayar gaji menyebabkan dia nekad untuk berhenti kerja. Namun kisah berakhir apabila dia bersetuju untuk bekerja semula apabila majikannya memintanya menguruskan kerja-kerja kebajikan membaiki rumah anak yatim.

programme.desc: Syifa hidup terbiar bersama datuk neneknya kerana mereka tidak mempunyai wang untuk membayar sewa. Mereka tidur di hadapan kedai-kedai yang berlainan setiap malam Syifa bekerja dengan mencari rumput untuk kambing-kambing Pak Broto, tetapi tidak lama kemudian mereka diusir. Mampukah Syifa dan datuk neneknya bertahan dari kesukaran hidup?

programme.title: D'Academy 5 Ep61
programme.desc: D'Academy kini kembali! D'Academy atau DA (singkatan dari Dangdut Academy) ialah pertunjukan bakat muzik dangdut yang pertama dan terbesar. Acara ini telah berjaya membangkitkan fenomena muzik dangdut, dan program ini telah menjadi salah satu pertunjukan pencarian bakat yang paling berjaya di Indonesia. Musim ini merupakan musim kelima dan diadakan buat kali pertama selepas tidak dihadirkan selama lima tahun.

programme.title: Indonesia Pintar S2 Ep4
programme.desc: Rancangan permainan terbesar di Indonesia yang mempertandingkan kecerdasan dan kecekapan 100 pelajar sekolah. Program ini diisi dengan pelbagai permainan menarik dan hadiah keseluruhan bernilai jutaan rupiah.

programme.title: Karnaval SCTV 33 Ep19
programme.desc: Setiap tahun, karnival SCTV mempunyai tema yang berbeza. Karnival ini menyajikan acara muzik yang paling menarik dan menampilkan ramai musikus serta selebriti terkemuka tanah air.

programme.title: Melukis Senja Ep5
programme.desc: Senja, seorang gadis yang baru sahaja memasuki sekolah barunya. Dia merupakan seorang pemain ice skating yang mahir. Namun, malangnya, suatu hari dia kalah dalam sebuah pertandingan kerana melihat sebuah anak patung Teddy Bear, yang menyebabkan dia trauma. Masa kanak-kanak Senja, di mana adiknya tenggelam dengan anak patung Teddy Bear kesayangannya, telah menyebabkan trauma padanya hingga kini. Senja akhirnya dibawa ke pakar psikiatri.

programme.title: Derita Hidup Ibu Penjual Kue Jalabia Yang Tak Dianggap Oleh Anak – Anaknya
programme.desc: Ibu sangat kecewa kerana anak perempuannya, Susi, berkahwin tanpa memberitahunya. Malah, Susi tidak mahu mengakui ibunya kerana ibunya hanya seorang penjual kuih jalabia.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep161
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: AKSI Indonesia Ep24
programme.desc: 24 Ustaz dan Ustazah dari pelbagai wilayah di Indonesia mengambil langkah untuk menang dengan melibatkan diri dalam pelbagai aktiviti Islamik yang menghiburkan dan bermakna. Saksikan dakwah mereka beraksi bersama para pengulas.

programme.title: Melukis Senja Ep5
programme.desc: Senja, seorang gadis yang baru sahaja memasuki sekolah barunya. Dia merupakan seorang pemain ice skating yang mahir. Namun, malangnya, suatu hari dia kalah dalam sebuah pertandingan kerana melihat sebuah anak patung Teddy Bear, yang menyebabkan dia trauma. Masa kanak-kanak Senja, di mana adiknya tenggelam dengan anak patung Teddy Bear kesayangannya, telah menyebabkan trauma padanya hingga kini. Senja akhirnya dibawa ke pakar psikiatri.

programme.title: Derita Hidup Ibu Penjual Kue Jalabia Yang Tak Dianggap Oleh Anak – Anaknya
programme.desc: Ibu sangat kecewa kerana anak perempuannya, Susi, berkahwin tanpa memberitahunya. Malah, Susi tidak mahu mengakui ibunya kerana ibunya hanya seorang penjual kuih jalabia.

programme.title: Kapankah Suamiku Kembalikan Senyumku?
programme.desc: Rossa telah berusaha bersungguh-sungguh untuk menerima dan menyayangi Reza seadanya, walaupun tidak bergaji besar. Dia menunjukkan kesabaran dan pemahaman terhadap keadaan mereka. Namun, perangai Reza terhadap Rossa mula berubah secara beransur-ansur dan tanpa diduga. Pada satu ketika, Rossa tidak boleh lagi berdiam diri selepas mendapati Reza mempunyai wanita lain dalam hidupnya bernama Dina.

programme.title: Pengorbananku Tak Ada Artinya Di Mata Suamiku
programme.desc: Fakta bahawa Novia dan Danil telah memiliki seorang anak telah menyumbang kepada keharmonian rumah tangga mereka, dan ini telah menjadikan Alma sebagai sebahagian daripada keluarga mereka. Adakah Novia akan kuat dalam menghadapi cabaran ini?

programme.title: Semarak Indosiar 2021 Ep29
programme.desc: Kemeriahan pentas Indosiar tetap hadir dengan keindahan budaya Indonesia dalam rancangan Indosiar Semarak 2021. Iringi malam anda dengan persembahan yang menakjubkan daripada artis serta penyanyi dari ibu kota.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep21
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: Dewi Rindu Ep22
programme.desc: Dewi adalah seorang gadis yang mempunyai impian yang sangat besar. Dia berazam untuk menjadi seorang yang berjaya dan membawa keluarganya keluar dari kesempitan hidup. Namun siapa sangka, impian indahnya itu musnah malah terpaksa mengharungi realiti pahit iaitu hamil di luar nikah.

programme.title: The Sultan S2 Ep34
programme.desc: The Sultan adalah rancangan bual bicara yang menampilkan dua pengacara yang kaya bak Sultan, iaitu Sultan Andara-Raffi Ahmad dan Sultan Bintaro-Andre Taulany dan ditemani oleh pengawal yang cantik dan tampan. Rancangan ini turut menampilkan bintang-bintang tetamu Indonesia yang terkenal.

programme.title: Tajwid Cinta Ep161
programme.desc: Dafri baru saja kembali ke Indonesia untuk bertemu dengan Alina dan bertunang. Walau bagaimanapun, pertunangan itu terhalang kerana Nadia tidak suka dengan hubungan Dafri Bersama anak perempuannya, Alina. Nadia dengan sengaja menghantar Dafri untuk belajar di Turki agar Dafri jauh dari anak perempuannya. Selain itu, ayah Dafri meminta Dafri untuk berkahwin dengan Syifa, seorang wanita yang pertama kali Dafri temui. Pada ketika itu, Syifa gagal berkahwin kerana bakal suaminya, Ilham, tiba-tiba menghilangkan diri. Selepas berkahwin dengan Dafri, Syifa dan suaminya tinggal di Jakarta.

programme.title: Derita Hidup Ibu Penjual Kue Jalabia Yang Tak Dianggap Oleh Anak – Anaknya
programme.desc: Ibu sangat kecewa kerana anak perempuannya, Susi, berkahwin tanpa memberitahunya. Malah, Susi tidak mahu mengakui ibunya kerana ibunya hanya seorang penjual kuih jalabia.

programme.title: Melukis Senja Ep5
programme.desc: Senja, seorang gadis yang baru sahaja memasuki sekolah barunya. Dia merupakan seorang pemain ice skating yang mahir. Namun, malangnya, suatu hari dia kalah dalam sebuah pertandingan kerana melihat sebuah anak patung Teddy Bear, yang menyebabkan dia trauma. Masa kanak-kanak Senja, di mana adiknya tenggelam dengan anak patung Teddy Bear kesayangannya, telah menyebabkan trauma padanya hingga kini. Senja akhirnya dibawa ke pakar psikiatri.

programme.title: AKSI Indonesia Ep23
programme.desc: 24 Ustaz dan Ustazah dari pelbagai wilayah di Indonesia mengambil langkah untuk menang dengan melibatkan diri dalam pelbagai aktiviti Islamik yang menghiburkan dan bermakna. Saksikan dakwah mereka beraksi bersama para pengulas.

programme.title: Kegigihan Anak Pencari Rumput Yang Sukses Menjadi Juragan Kambing
programme.desc: Syifa hidup terbiar bersama datuk neneknya kerana mereka tidak mempunyai wang untuk membayar sewa. programme.title: Indonesia Pintar S2 Ep5
programme.desc: Rancangan permainan terbesar di Indonesia yang mempertandingkan kecerdasan dan kecekapan 100 pelajar sekolah. Program ini diisi dengan pelbagai permainan menarik dan hadiah keseluruhan bernilai jutaan rupiah.

programme.title: The Thieves
programme.desc: Korean and Hong Kong thieves team up to heist a $20M worth diamond, while everyone has their own agenda to keep the diamond for themselves.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.title: April Snow
programme.desc: A heart-piercing love story between two people, In-su and Seo-young, encountered under unexpected incident that began to shake their serene lives.

programme.title: Search Out
programme.desc: When a social media influencer finds traces of cyberbullying that led to his neighbor's suicide, he teams up with his friend to untangle the mystery behind the deadly game.

programme.title: Countdown
programme.desc: A debt collector has liver cancer and has to get a liver transplant in 10 days. A seductive swindler agrees to donate her liver only if he tracks down the man who put her in prison.

programme.title: The Tiger
programme.desc: While the Kingdom of Korea is under occupation by the Japanese, an old and experienced hunter is challenged by the hunt of the last tiger in the country.

programme.title: Honeysweet
programme.desc: Chi-ho is a successful product designer. Il-young works in a loan company. They meet at her company when he try to pay his brother's debt. Coincidence brings them to become closer.

programme.title: Concrete Utopia
programme.desc: Seoul has laid in ruin after an earthquake, leaving one single apartment remains standing. The apartment's resident representative strives to protect residents from outsiders...

programme.title: A Day
programme.desc: A man commits an unethical act in an attempt to save his daughter's life. Three years later, his actions return to haunt him.

programme.title: Voice Of A Murderer
programme.desc: The only son of a news anchor disappears without a trace. There is a veteran cop and his special task force assigned to this case, but there is an indication the kidnapper is aware of their presence.

programme.title: Confidential Assignment
programme.desc: When a crime organization from N. Korea crosses borders and enters S. Korea, a S. Korean detective must cooperate with a N. Korean detective to investigate their whereabouts.

programme.title: Kingmaker
programme.desc: A politician met a talented campaign strategist who helped him in becoming the strongest presidential election candidate. Yet conflicts deepen as the he disagrees with the latter on his ideologies.

programme.title: Bear Man
programme.desc: Two bears from the Institute of techonolgy have turned into humans after eating garlic and mugwort. Yet, one has grown up into a police, while one has become a gangster...

programme.title: Heung-Boo: The Revolutionist
programme.desc: Set in the Joseon dynasty, a satirical street play becomes popular among the people. Heung-boo, its author, gains fame and is sought by conflicting powers who want to use him for their own agendas.

programme.title: Be With You
programme.desc: Before her death, a woman promises her family that she would return on a rainy day, one year later. Miraculously, she reappears before her husband and son but has no memory about her past.

programme.title: My Little Bride
programme.desc: A high school girl was forced to marry a college student by her grandfather. The effort to keep the marriage secret was soon challenged as her husband will be teaching in her school as an intern

programme.title: Pain
programme.desc: A debt collector who has lost his sense of pain after a traumatic accident during his youth falls for a street vendor who suffers from severe hemophilia.

programme.title: The Client
programme.desc: Elite attorney Kang Seong-hee goes up against a top prosecutor over a case involving a man accused of killing his wife.

programme.title: Joseon Chefs
programme.desc: A nobleman who has passed the national civil service exam meets the self-proclaimed best chef in Joseon, falls into the world of gourmet food, and sets out to find the life he truly wants.

programme.title: I Am Father
programme.desc: A magician was framed for murder by a corrupt detective. When his deceased wife's heart was found suitable for the detective's daughter transplantation, he decided to take revenge.

programme.title: Broken
programme.desc: Two teenage boys raped and murdered Sang-hyun's daughter. The infuriated father unintensionally killed one of the murderer and became a fugitive himself...

programme.title: Beasts Clawing At Straws
programme.desc: Driven by their own desperate desires, the destinies of 8 down-on-their-luck individuals slowly converge and come crashing down while chasing after a mysterious money bag.

programme.title: My Lovely Angel
programme.desc: A man bears the responsibility to take care of a deaf-blind girl unexpectedly, which turns out to be life-changing to both of them.

programme.title: The Assassin
programme.desc: Swordsman Lee Nan hides in a village to escape from his enemies. There, he witnessed atrocities and people are desperate for help. The killer buried in his heart finally makes his appearance.

programme.title: 100% Wife (T) Ep60
programme.desc: Three generations of the Jin family live under one roof. Mrs. Jin-Ke mei-man has two sons, You-Tsai and You-De. You-Tsai abandoned the family many years ago, leaving his wife Siou-Ying to shoulder the huge responsibility of the Jin family business selling fish products at market. Although Siou-Ying was betrayed by You-Tsai, she has still been a dutiful daughter to her mother-in-law, and has single-mindedly raised four children.

programme.title: The Tradition Story of Taiwan (T) Ep4881
programme.desc: The Tradition Story of Taiwan presents a series of tales and folktales in Taiwan that have been pass down from one generation to another generation

programme.title: Hot Door Night (M) Ep2197
programme.desc: Different in age, generation, and hosting style, these three hosts not only can sing, act, dance, and imitate, but are also skilled in cross-talk! With this unique combination, we hope to attract viewers of all ages and spark great entertainment.

programme.title: Stylish Man-The Chef (M) Ep3822
programme.desc: <Stylish Man The Chef> is co-hosted by the Golden Bell Awards winner Sam Tseng and Genie Chuo, together with professional chef, James. programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: My Hero, My Daddy (M) Ep1617
programme.desc: A fathers love for his daughters landed Jinfa Huang in battles against other men right within his family, as he found himself in conflict with his sons-in-law. His 3 daughters each possessed a distinct personality but were similarly headstrong and in romantic relationships that caused their fathers brows to crease. Tianlan, his eldest, was in love with Minglu Xu, Jinfas superior who never missed an opportunity to make life difficult for him; Tianhong, his second daughter, was drifting apart from him because of her husband; meanwhile, his youngest girl was challenging the taboo of a campus romance. How would Jinfa emerge victor in this fight to protect the 3 loves of his life?

programme.title: Battle Tour (M) Ep54
programme.desc: Brand new concept of a travelogue show! Hosts will be using a different perspectives and knowledge to show you the latest tourist spots to check in!

programme.title: Show Biz (M) Ep940941
programme.desc: Every second counts in "Show Biz" to bring you with the most High Speed star news, exciting live shows and performers interviews.

programme.title: The Borderless World (M) Ep724
programme.desc: Journalist with an infallible nose for a story is leading the audience to explore the world. Exploring how people from different cultures overcome the challenges with collective wisdom.

programme.title: Mr.Player (M) Ep500
programme.desc: Depending on the locations of the missions, Jacky Wu, the leader of the home team, invites various celebrities to take on challenges and bring you excitement every week.

programme.title: A Hint of You (M) Ep3738
programme.desc: As the chef and owner of "All One Hundred" stir-fry restaurant, Ching-Yo Xia is determined to recreate the delicious fried rice her father used to make. To achieve this, she hones her culinary skills by learning from Master Chef Zhai-Yu Fu of a high-end teppanyaki restaurant. Despite her resilience and fearlessness in the face of challenges, Ching-Yo somehow manages to turn Culinary Prince Zhai-Yu's graceful life upside down!

programme.title: Red Line
programme.desc: A former professional car racer, Le falls into despair after causing his brother's death in a car race, until he meets female doctor Hui and becomes an ambulance driver who vows to save lives with speed. Meanwhile, the truth about his brothers accident emerges with the investigation of Le's three good friends...

programme.title: Those Were the Days
programme.desc: Director Wong despises Cantonese movies of the 60s, but accidentally travels back in time to that movie set. He meets Director Chu, who tells him he can return to modern time if someone likes the film he makes. Wong meets four classic movie stars and invites them to star in his new film, but it flops unexpectedly. Can Wong return to the present?

programme.title: The Calling of a Bus Driver
programme.desc: A girl named Suki fulfills her dream of being a bus driver after breaking up with her boyfriend, who has an affair with her good friend. When Suki is invited to attend her ex-boyfriends wedding, she is presented with a chance for revenge will she take it and turn her life around?

programme.title: Imprisoned 2: There Is No Escape From Fate
programme.desc: Hong Kong businessman Yu and his secretary travel abroad for business meetings. When the secretary is killed in their hotel, Yu is arrested. Despite pleading not guilty, Yu is imprisoned in a cruel multinational prison where the warden enjoys torturing prisoners, and he must find a way to escape from this dark and deadly prison to survive.

programme.title: Saving General Yang
programme.desc: The Khitan army takes revenge for a past massacre by abducting General Yang Ye and setting up a deadly trap for the seven Yang brothers. Led by the eldest son, the seven brothers set out with a small band of fighters to bring their father home.

programme.title: CZ12
programme.desc: Hawk leads a mercenary team to recover the bronze heads of the 12 Chinese zodiac animals, which were looted by foreigners in the 1800s. With a promise of a 10 times bonus by MP Corp if he can recover all of them, Hawk stops at nothing to accomplish the mission.

programme.title: Tales from the Occult: Ultimate Malevolence
programme.desc: The final chapter of 'Tales From The Occult', the movie features three short stories about two high school friends, a magician undergoing hypnosis to find her missing friend, and a man finding his way out of a mysterious building. The stories reveal the most terrifying and ugly side of human nature, where life and death are just a thought away!

programme.title: Trivisa
programme.desc: In the beginning of 1997, Hong Kong's three notorious thieves who have never met one another before appear in the same restaurant. This leads to a rumour that they are joining forces to pull off something big before the Handover, though this is not something that any of them is aware of.

programme.title: Dad, I'm Sorry
programme.desc: Ba Sang lives in a poor district in Saigon and his son Woan is a Youtuber earning considerable income. Woan wants his father to enjoy retirement, so he is mad at him for being a meddler and making unnecessary sacrifices. This has created conflicts between the two generations and leads to a crisis in the father and son relationship.

programme.title: Wolf Pack
programme.desc: The Wolf Pack squad led by Lao Diao, is a foreign-based team that specializes in overseas security jobs. In one of the missions, the squad discovers that a terrorist force is planning to destroy the countrys energy source. Lao Diao is now entrusted with the task of leading his squad to fight back. Can the Wolf Pack save the day?

programme.title: Endless Battle
programme.desc: This is a story about two brothers. The younger brother is a drug lord while the elder brother Zhong is a police officer in the Narcotics Bureau. Both are involved in a drug cartels turf battle and during an escort mission, Zhong discovers his brothers hidden identity. This leads to an endless battle between good and evil.

programme.title: Undercover Hidden Dragon
programme.desc: In this hilarious comedy, Fat is a gangster who suffers from amnesia. Believing that he is actually an undercover policeman, Fat attempts to arrest gang leader Big Bro, but instead becomes the gangsters best ally. To complicate matters further, a gangster named Wind, who looks exactly like Fat, starts a turf war with Big Bro.

programme.title: Lion Rock
programme.desc: Based on the true story of David Ki, one of Asias top rock climbers who lost everything when a motorcycle accident crippled him. Rather than succumbing to his fate, David found a way of scaling the dizzying peaks again by becoming a wheelchair-bound athlete and soon reached the peak of Lion Rock!

programme.title: Beauty And The 7 Beasts
programme.desc: Teddy, once a renowned movie star, is facing a career decline. To make a living, he accepts five disciples to shape them into stars. Teddys career regains momentum after he reunites with his long-lost daughter, but he is also confronted by a rival at the same time. His daughter and disciples decide to help him overcome this difficult situation

programme.title: Trending Topic
programme.desc: Chen Miao, an online media editor-in-chief, wrote a popular article which has become a trending topic. This however, led indirectly to a girls suicide. After receiving a help request, she realises that there is more to the story than meets the eye. As public opinion sways on the case, a war to speak up for the weak has begun!

programme.title: Quan Dao: The Journey of a Boxer
programme.desc: Ah Niu learns boxing from Uncle Xing, the boss of a boxing studio, since young and uses his skills to help the weak fight villains. When Xings son attempts drug trafficking to save his fathers studio but fails and is brutally beaten up, Ah Niu accepts a death combat challenge so as to help him take revenge.

programme.title: The Knight of Shadows: Between Yin and Yang
programme.desc: Pu Song Ling, a legendary demon hunter, is asked to investigate a case involving missing teenage village girls with disciple, Constable Yan Fei. The duo leads a group of little monsters to help with the investigation, and in their search for the truth, they accidentally discover a mysterious love between a knight and a female ghost.

programme.title: The Way We Dance
programme.desc: Tofu shop girl Fleur possesses a quirky gift for hip hop and dance which she uses to becomes a supernova in the university dance crew. Meanwhile, Alan, from the Tai Chi Club has an eye for Fleur's sleight of hand and tries to recruit her into his club.

programme.title: Death Stranding
programme.desc: To overhaul the underground gambling industry, the police join hands with the gambling association to crack down on illegal casinos. They auction off new casino licenses to regulate the industry, but this results in an upheaval in the gambling world, unveiling the hidden interests and secrets while sparking conflicts between gangs...

programme.title: Love Never Ends
programme.desc: An empty-nest elderly man and a widowed elderly woman who collects scrap, meet unexpectedly and gradually develop feelings for each other. An elderly couple whose wife suffers from a serious illness, makes a living by selling scrap. Both these elderly couples fall deeply in love and prove that love never ends, even if there is no tomorrow!

programme.title: Golden Chicken 2
programme.desc: The sequel is set in 2046 when a 82-year-old Ah Kam stops a heartbroken young man from taking memory loss pills. To help ease his pain, Ah Kam shares her life stories from 2003, one of Hong Kongs toughest year with SARS, including the different people she comes across and the bittersweet romance between herself and her cousin.

programme.title: I Still Remember
programme.desc: Chi is a property agent who leads an aimless and unfulfilling life until he reunites with his P.E. teacher, Wong, from primary school. Despite his illness, Wong insists on keeping his promise of completing a 10K marathon to his late wife. Inspired by Wong, Chi brings himself to his feet and finds the courage to cheer himself on!

programme.title: My Blue Summer
programme.desc: Zhi has been secretly in love with Nan since she met him once as a child. After graduating high school, Zhi realizes that she and Nan are in the same university, where they get to know each other by chance and become close friends. However, Zhi is still too shy to express her love for Nan. Will this long-term crush finally turn into true love?

programme.title: Still Human
programme.desc: Evelyn, a Filipino domestic helper, moves to Hong Kong to work for Cheong Wing, a divorcee paralyzed in a construction accident. Becoming unlikely friends, the two discover shared humanity that helps them face lifes mounting hardships.

programme.title: Ghost Wedding
programme.desc: Photographer Zhi Cheng is entangled with a "woman in red", leading to the deaths of his relatives one by one. When the girl he likes, Si Tong, also dies mysteriously, Zhi Cheng vows to find out the truth but ends up revealing the secret of a "ghost marriage"...

programme.title: My Wife is a Gambling Maestro
programme.desc: Natalie Yao Meng stars as the gambling queen, Ying Ying, who is a contender for the Asian God of Gamblers competition. But before the competition she is betrayed by her fianc and left for dead. Rescued by a young man called Gerrard (Nick Cheung) but suffering from amnesia, Ying Ying, must recover in time to compete in the big event!

programme.title: The Rescue
programme.desc: An emergency occurs on an offshore drilling rig that would cause it to capsize and sink. The Emergency Response Unit races against the clock in a chopper rescue mission amidst dangerous explosions and fire. Captain Gao Qian must work seamlessly with his chopper pilot Zhao Cheng to rescue survivors using the most maverick and dangerous tactics.

programme.title: Flirting Scholar from the Future
programme.desc: Tiger, Lambert and Skinny Pig are massive fans of the movie, Flirting Scholar. One day, Skinny Pig who is an obscure inventor, puts together a movie time machine and accidentally sucks all of them into the movie of Flirting Scholar. The trio head off to Wah mansion to meet the maid Autumn can they find her and can they return to the present?

programme.title: Chilli Laugh Story
programme.desc: Coba is forced to work at home during COVID-19 and fights with his family every day. He decides to turn his mothers chilli sauce into a trendy commodity to keep his family occupied. With his mother, father and aunt making the chilli sauce together, the family sells it online and the business grows beyond their imagination.

programme.title: The Silent War
programme.desc: After the Chinese Civil War, 701 Bureau continues to monitor the coded transmissions between rebel forces. When radio frequencies used by the opponent disappear suddenly, Agent Zhang asks Ho, a blind piano tuner with exceptional hearing, to help find the transmission signals. Can Ho find the missing signals and foil a possible assassination plot?

programme.title: The White Storm 2: Drug Lords
programme.desc: In this epic action-thriller starring Andy Lau and Louis Koo, the two award-winning best actors star on opposing sides of a drug war. As a bounty of $100 million Hong Kong dollars is made to hunt down the biggest drug dealer in the city, Hong Kong becomes the battleground for the fight between good and evil.

programme.title: Tainted Love
programme.desc: Office lady Zhou Ran falls victim to an online dating love scam and is cheated of 550,000 yuan. Following faint clues left by the scammer, Zhou Ran comes to a small coastal town and encounters two young men. She gradually discovers that these two men have hidden the clues of the scam, and sets out on her revenge plan.

programme.title: Young and Dangerous: Reloaded
programme.desc: In this remake of Young and Dangerous, Chan Ho Nam and his three buddies of the Hung Hing triad gang strive to fight for their own justice, further expanding their power in the triad and becoming a new legend...

programme.title: Rendezvous With Death
programme.desc: Sun Chung had been recognized as an expert comedy and crime thriller director, but he was to gain even greater acclaim for his soulful, powerful, intelligent, and beautifully-made martial arts epics. This stands alongside The Deadly Breaking Sword and The Kung-fu Instructor as one of his very best. It's not so much the plot - a master swordsman protects a treasure chest on a dangerous journey - that makes this great, but what Sun does with it, inspiring the cast and crew to some of their finest work.

programme.title: The Millionaire Chase
programme.desc: It's a fun and wild romp that mixes pleasure with pleasure. A nightclub owner, playboy Peter Chen Ho, has his ways with three sisters while gallivanting across Asia. Each one has a dangling relationship to save - ensuring a series of mishaps and comic moments.

programme.title: Village of Tigers
programme.desc: The devilish residents of the Village of Tigers, led by Hu Jiao, plan to kill Lo Hong Shun, otherwise known as the heroic Sword of the Southern Sky. Hu Jiao sees a way to use the righteousness of the honorable Ba family to help him kill the hero Lo by turning them against him. Will good prevail over evil?

programme.title: Diau Charn
programme.desc: In the Han Dynasty, the tyrannical Prime Minister Dong Zuo takes control of the country, so Minister Wang plots to take him down using Diau Charns beauty. Wang arranges for her to be Dongs concubine as he knows Dongs adopted son Lu Bu is in love with her, turning them against each other. Lu Bu ends up killing Dong Zuo to be with Diau Charn.

programme.title: The Singing Thief
programme.desc: A master jewel thief turns over a new leaf as a professional singer in a nightclub. However, a series of robberies happened shortly after and he becomes the suspect again. The thief then sets up a trap to snare the copycat but will this backfire on him?

programme.title: Return of the Crazy Bumpkins
programme.desc: This sequel makes for more bittersweet laughs and heart-wrenching misfortune, as Ah Niu gets out of the jail to find his true love becoming the wife of an abusive husband, and his uncle further exploits his naive nature.

programme.title: The Duel
programme.desc: After knowing his brother has killed the head of a rival triad, Jie takes the blame and was hunted by killers. With the help of Rambler Nan, Jie finally killed his enemies, but then found out that Nan is the one who has killed his father.

programme.title: Sons Of Good Earth
programme.desc: This is an epic tale set during the time of the Sino-Japanese war. A painter Yu saves a young girl, Lotus, who is being sold to a brothel. They fall in love, get married and settled in to a peaceful life. However, their life is soon shattered by the Japanese invasion and the brutal regime that follows.

programme.title: The Condemned
programme.desc: Yang Lin is a righteous hero who helps an unjustly imprisoned swordsman accused of stealing. They break out of prison together, and warn all evil men they know to watch out for a new deadly duo in town.

programme.title: Blue Skies
programme.desc: A young singer Hsiao Yun becomes an overnight sensation after standing in for another singer at the eleventh hour. Her success comes at a heavy price however, when her love with a pianist suffers. On top of this, Hsiao Yun must also deal with the unwanted affections from an influential backer of her show.

programme.title: The Killer Has No Return
programme.desc: Professional killer Lui goes to Malaysia after completing his mission of killing the big boss of a Hong Kong gang. His next target is a groom who is throwing his wedding banquet at a hotel in Chinatown. Just when Lui takes aim at his target, another victim instead of the groom is shot, and he becomes a scapegoat in this mystery assassination.

programme.title: Sweet And Wild
programme.desc: Fang is a spunky young village girl who is not afraid to fight back against hooligans. She gets into trouble with the biggest hoodlum Tong when she foils his plans with a maid, causing Tong to plot a revenge. Luckily a man whom she is attracted to, Hai, comes in time to her rescue. Can they fight back?

programme.title: Swordswomen Three
programme.desc: Crouching Tiger, Hidden Dragon could be called "Swordswomen Two." Three decades earlier, Shen Yi, Essie Lin Chia, and Pan Ying-tzu took on Shaw's first international superstar, Lo Lieh for the Han Family Sword - making this a four-star treat for action fans.

programme.title: Three Sinners
programme.desc: Based on the classic Ming Dynasty novel The Water Margin, Three Sinners is a Huangmei Opera about love, betrayal, murder, and redemption. Starring Hong Kong's premiere movie couple, it is one of the grandest Eastmancolor-Shawscope costume musicals in the Shaw Brothers library.

programme.title: The Lady Assassin
programme.desc: Two feuding princes fight for the throne in the Qing Dynasty, causing many injuries and deaths to the commoners. Can the lady assassin who is drawn into this royal feud execute her assassination mission in time to help one of the princes secure the throne?

programme.title: Mr Funny - bone
programme.desc: Join Mr Funny bone in a series of comic vignettes as he attempts to win the heart of a dashing lady. Along for the ride is his loyal sidekick Mr Big Potato, a stout fellow who is forever getting into silly mishaps. The pair gets involved in plenty of shenanigans and gags!

programme.title: The Tigress Of Shaolin
programme.desc: Sam is being hunted as he discovers that the mayor and the chief of medical bureau are colluding with a drug dealer. He is saved by a fishermen family and works in their friends grocery but the grocery owner is killed when the enemies track Sam down. Sam escapes to Shaolin to learn the cudgel style of kung fu in order to avenge his friends.

programme.title: The Emperor and the Minister
programme.desc: The ingenious imperial scholar Liu Yung always embarrasses Emperor Chien Lung with his quick wit and gift of gab. The emperor purposely sets him up to solve the seemingly unsolvable. However, Liu Yung resolves it easily with wit and style and foils the emperors plot once again.

programme.title: The Magnificent Swordsman
programme.desc: The Magnificent Swordsman centres on the hero who vows vengeance against evil bandits who killed his family when he was a child. The hero recruits several friends to help the peasants rid their village of marauding bandits, the leader of the band being the man who killed his family.

programme.title: My Name Ain't Suzie
programme.desc: Young Mei Li works as a bar girl in Wanchai to make a living. When she meets Jimmy in the bar, she thinks he is her true love and falls crazily in love with him. When Jimmy has to leave, Mei Li is devastated. It is not until she encounters the triad boss Ying that she finally found someone to count on.

programme.title: Executioners From Shaolin
programme.desc: The White-Browed Priest supports the brutal Qing government, burning down Shaolin Temple and hunting its disciples. Hung from Shaolin falls in love with Fang while escaping from the hunt and the couple have a son before Hung is killed by the Priest. To avenge his father, Hung creates a new form of martial art combining his parents kung fu styles.

programme.title: Forever And Ever
programme.desc: Ivy Ling Po plays a young scholar who is manipulated into marrying a nobleman's reluctant daughter. After marrying, he soon discovers the reason for her hesitation. She is stricken with a contagious disease. But, with the power of true love, their romance prevails.

programme.title: Heroes Of Sung
programme.desc: Heroes Of Sung stars one of the original kung fu ladies of the silver screen, Shih Szu, who plays swordswoman Meng Hung. She must work with Fan Tien-Fu, played by Lo Lieh to find and protect the royal seals of the Sung Dynasty. Shih's magnificent performance earned her the female hero role in another hit Dracula And The 7 Golden Vampires.

programme.title: Rear Entrance
programme.desc: Mrs Xu is childless and watches a lonely little girl playing at the rear entrance from afar every day. She warmly nurtures the girl and even adopts her from her uncaring parent. The girl brings happiness to the Xus until her long lost mother appears one day and to make her happy, Mrs Xu reluctantly lets the girl reunite with her mother.

programme.title: The Voyage of Emperor Chien Lung
programme.desc: Emperor Chien Lung continues his incognito voyage to southern China. Accompanied by the minister and the imperial scholar, they have many amusing encounters in Yangzhou.

programme.title: Twin Blades Of Doom
programme.desc: A retired martial artist is forced to return with a vengeance after his family and friends are murdered by the evil Ghost Gang. He decides to challenge the gangs leader to a deadly duel so as to take revenge. Can he defeat the ruthless leader in the end?

programme.title: Crazy Shaolin Disciples
programme.desc: Three young kung-fu warriors from wildly different backgrounds become students of Shaolin at the same temple. These three warriors are: Royal Guard Lo Lieh, fleeing soldier, Lo Meng, and villager, Wang Yu.

programme.title: Six Assassins
programme.desc: Lord Li Ming is a feudal tyrant who oppresses the people, and even the Emperor who is his brother, cannot stop his evil act. Righteous swordsman Mu poses as Li Mings guard to plan for his assassination. He arrests six assassins who have tried to kill Li Ming, before making them his allies in a secret plot to kill him and end the tyranny.

programme.title: Rose, Be My Love
programme.desc: Not a love triangle but a love 'rectangle', Rose, Be My Love is a romantic drama set on the eve of World War II that represents the high standards achieved by Shaw Brothers in both aspects of star power and technical polish.

programme.title: The Black Tavern
programme.desc: This sword-filled thriller centres on The Black Tavern an inn where the down and dirty meet to plot nefarious doings. A bunch of villains are lured to the inn by a rumour about a valuable treasure being hidden there. After all the backstabbing and killings, they realise that it is a trap created to wipe them out once and for all

programme.title: Empress Wu
programme.desc: Wu Ze Tian is a beautiful and talented concubine of Emperor Tang at age 14. She becomes a nun after he died but has two sons with the new Emperor Tang Gao Zong. The Empress asks Wu to team up with her against Consort Xiao, but is set up and dethroned by Wu, who also kills her two sons. After the Emperors death, Wu becomes the first woman Emperor.

programme.title: Dragon Swamp
programme.desc: Fan is cheated by her lover Tong to steal her masters Jade Dragon Sword. She is jailed in the Dragon Swamp as punishment and gave birth to a pair of twins - her daughter is raised by her master, while her son is taken by Tong. Twenty years later, the sword is stolen again and Fans daughter goes seeking for it, meeting Fans friend along the way.

programme.title: Let's Fall In Love
programme.desc: Da Yung, the son of a rich entrepreneur, meets Lian Lian, the niece of a kindergarten principal by chance. They get into a misunderstanding at the first meeting, causing Da Yung to lose his wallet. Further misunderstanding occurs when he tries to use her to act as his fianc, in order to drive away two women whom he does not like

programme.title: Mad Monkey Kung Fu
programme.desc: Master Chen was an esteemed Monkey Kung Fu master, until he is framed and crippled by a ruthless villain and ends up becoming a wandering artiste. When Chen meets a young man, Little Monkey, on the streets, he decides to teach him all his monkey kung fu moves. Both men eventually team up to avenge Chens past insult.

programme.title: The Comedy of Mismatches
programme.desc: Two pairs of lovers got mismatched accidentally. The man disguises as a woman for his sisters wedding ceremony, while his lover disguises as a man to marry another woman. After the marriage mismatches are revealed, the lovers and their families are taken to court, where Prefecture Chief Qiao manages to work out a happy ending.

programme.desc: Dr Michael Mosley and the 30 other patients enrolled in the trial are diagnosed with chronic, but common sleep disorders. They must now embrace their strict, personalised eight-week treatment regime.

programme.title: South Korea with Alexander Armstrong S1 Ep1
programme.desc: Arriving late at night in bustling downtown Seoul, Alexander kicks off his epic Korean adventure in Gangnam, the fabled district immortalised by Psy's Gangnam Style video - the most viewed song on YouTube.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Sammi, Rose, and Casey Ep1
programme.desc: Roam across America with a road-tripping chicken and meet a mouse family living in an English garden. Beat arachnophobia with a spiders help, trek with the guardian of Earths last two northern white rhinos, and celebrate more interspecies pals.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Battle for the Bay Ep5
programme.desc: Follow the Bay Familys matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: My Best Friend's An Animal 1 - Spud, Digger, and Tommy Ep3
programme.desc: Explore the Tasmanian Devils softer side, meet a pioneering sea turtle, and enjoy family dinner with Buttons the deer. Play football with 800-kilogram Spud the bull and learn how Digger the owl soothed conservationist Nigel during his cancer treatment.

programme.title: A Bee's Diary
programme.desc: In a beehive, tens of thousands of tiny animals work toward a common goal: the survival of the colony. But what is life like for an individual honeybee? A Bees Diary tells that story.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summers soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Attack and Defend 1 - Water Warriors Ep6
programme.desc: From powerful sharks to mysterious and beautiful fish shoals, the underwater dynamic between predator and prey continues. Evolution is on display in these clever creatures as they use all their skills to survive.

programme.title: Orangutan Jungle School 1 - A Whole New World Ep5
programme.desc: Now that albino orangutan Albas here, how will her classmates react? Plus, take a tour of the nursery school, see how Beni deals with a big bully, and watch as a few feisty females find their place in a new hierarchy.

programme.title: Wildlife Icons 2 - Fantastic Frogs Ep2
programme.desc: Their ancestors were the first vertebrates to colonise dry land and they inhabit every continent except Antarctica, but their world is rapidly changing. Twenty species call this city home but what was once wetlands are now playgrounds, golf courses and race tracks. This is the land to which they cling. Around the world frog populations are in decline and time is running out.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: A Wild Year on Earth 1 - January-February - the Year Begins Ep1
programme.desc: In the early months of the year, the Earths axial tilt brings the height of summer in some places and the depths of winter in others. See how life struggles to survive under these extreme conditions.

programme.title: Uptown Otters 1 - Battle for the Bay Ep5
programme.desc: Follow the Bay Familys matriarch as she chases the Nomads out of her territory for good, and examine the surprising birthing den where the Townies leader, Mia, settles in. Then kick back with the Mangrove Family as they pal around with stray dogs.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Seasons Ep12
programme.desc: Wild Wild East travels through time and space to show what one-year and four seasons looks like for the wildest animals of Canadas East-Coast.

programme.title: Pridelands: Wilderness Reborn
programme.desc: An Australian family go on an adventure to restore an old hunting ranch in South Africa. Their goal is to rebuild the overgrown habitat, create an eco-tourism ranch, and allow the natural wildlife, including predators, to move back in.

programme.title: Loons: A Cry from the Mist
programme.desc: Race the clock with biologists as they try to figure out why North American loons are suddenly in danger. Unlock the mysterious lives of these beloved birds, and ponder whether their cries will continue to be summers soundtrack or go silent forever.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Back with the Packs Ep1
programme.desc: Return to South Luangwa to see the new pups born to the mighty Manzi and the tiny-but-fearless Kakumbi packs. See yearling Snowy face a hungry hyena before a lion pride scatters Manzi mum Wekas pups and leaves her frantically searching for them.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Deer Ep13
programme.desc: In Hampton, New Brunswick the deer population is running wild. In the summer locals struggle to maintain their crops from growing fawns and hungry does. Sightings have reached an all time high and residents fear the overpopulation may be at its tipping point.

programme.title: Great Parks of Africa 1 - Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park Ep5
programme.desc: In the southern reaches of Africas great Kalahari basin, everything is made tough. Ancient rivers harbor water deep underground, and these hidden lifelines forge a fragile link to survival. This is the Kgalagadi Transfrontier Park.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - The Drakensberg: Barrier of Spears Ep1
programme.desc: This documentary looks at the wildlife of The Drakensberg Mountain range. We take a look at how creatures survive in the hostile landscape, from the highest peaks to the rolling grasslands below.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - The Sandveld: Land of Contrasts Ep3
programme.desc: A narrow and harsh belt of western coastline in southern Africa is a land of contrasts where creatures are forced to adapt to survive. Meet the quirky and charismatic inhabitants that call this fragile interplay between land and ocean home.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - De Hoop: Place of Hope Ep5
programme.desc: This small park makes a big difference to endangered animals. Offering sanctuary to some of the biggest and smallest animals on the planet, witness how species come back from the edge of extinction to reclaim their place in Africas wilderness.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Baby Sea Otter Finds a Family Ep1
programme.desc: Join the vet and his team in saving a massive sea lion caught in a plastic noose, and then visit the Rescue Center, where a harbor seal pup may lose its eyesight and a baby sea otter needs a risky but life-saving surgery.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - Battle to Save a Sea Lion Ep2
programme.desc: Battle wind and waves to find a sea lion trapped in a plastic ring. Then visit the rescue center, where over 80 orphan seals must be fed several times a day to prepare for release into the wild, and see an Amazonian duck get a miraculous operation.

programme.title: Wild Pacific Rescue 1 - One Very Lost Sea Turtle Ep3
programme.desc: Follow the team in healing and releasing a grumpy sea turtle, and then meet a sea lion with an unusual injury that must be taken by crane to the rescue centre. Find out how the vet aids an aging fruit bat and a community rescues a one-eyed seal pup.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Collisions Ep1
programme.desc: Observe the natural and human forces that have shaped Ningaloo Reef, Cape Range, and Exmouth Gulf with Tim, Traditional Owners, and other experts. Check out a million-year-old fossil reef, a gargantuan fish, and a ray that packs quite a punch.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Connections Ep2
programme.desc: Follow scientists and Traditional Owners as they map out ecological links, migratory pathways, and interspecies bonds that conserve Ningaloos biodiversity. Frolic with whales, float among seaweed islands, and see archaeologists nix a settler myth.

programme.title: Ningaloo: Australia's Ocean Wonder 1 - Choices Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how Ningaloos conservation miracle could inspire humans to pull the planet back from the brink of climatic destruction. Visit an abandoned whaling station and other ruins that show we have the tools, if only we can find the will to change.

programme.title: Stormborn 1 - Children of the Storm Ep3
programme.desc: In Iceland only one out of six cubs has survived. Abandoned by her parents, she now has to fend for herself. The reindeer herd swim two miles across open water. In Scotland, 35,000 grey seals arrive for their annual breeding season.

programme.title: Wild Dogs: Pack vs. Pride 2 - Hunting with the Manzi Ep2
programme.desc: Run into a lion-hyena showdown with Julz as he hunts for the elusive Manzi pack, who are missing four of their precious pups. Then join Henry from the Zambian Carnivore Programme on a house call to the Kakumbi den, where another pup has gone AWOL.

programme.title: Wild Wild East 1 - Whales Ep14
programme.desc: Brier Island is at the western point of the Bay of Fundy in Nova Scotia. And in the surrounding waters live an incredible number of humpback whales and dolphins. On still waters, Humpbacks smash their tails, flap their fins, and breach one en masse. Its an incredible sight. A pod of dolphins swims into the Bay of Fundy, feeding off herring. Theyre soon joined by an Orca that capitalizes on their feeding strategies.

programme.title: Volcanic Odysseys 2 - Indonesia: Islands of Fire Ep1
programme.desc: With approximately 130 active volcanoes, Indonesia is arguably the most active place on earth. Volcanologist Tom Pfeiffer leads an expedition to some of Indonesia's most remote and rarely visited volcanoes.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - Gardens in the Clouds Ep2
programme.desc: The ancient plants and animals of the Cloud Mountains of South Africa have long captured peoples imagination. Its a landscape defined by weather and threatened by invaders. But these mountains are not only a sanctuary for life in the present; they also offer a fascinating window into our past.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - Namaqualand: the Desert Bloom Ep4
programme.desc: For most of the year its a desert, but during early August and September the dusty valleys of Namaqualand transform into a wonderland carpeted with wildflowers. Witness this magnificent transformation from arid desert to beautiful oasis.

programme.title: Africa's Hidden Kingdoms 1 - Kogelberg Ep6
programme.desc: Considered to be the most beautiful of the Capes protected areas, Kogelberg Nature Reserve has experienced minimal human interference. Discover the spectacular land and sea life flourishing in this unique botanical wonderland.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - House Hunting Hermit Crabs Ep2
programme.desc: Get in line with hermit crabs for an orderly shell exchange on a Belize beach, then meet a Senegalese chimps pet genet. Float with an otter who swaps hostages for free meals and admire the agricultural prowess of leafcutter ants in the rainforest.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Meerkat Survival School Ep3
programme.desc: Learn how to disarm and dine on scorpions with meerkat pups in the Kalahari Desert and review a lioness flirting strategy in Kenya. Meet same-sex penguin couples who are raising chicks together, then sign up for an Asian elephant babysitters club.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Pirate Birds Ep4
programme.desc: Go rogue with frigate birds, who steal meals from smaller seabirds; relax in a mongoose-run spa with a grateful warthog; and decode an African elephants secret message. Then watch lovelorn capuchin monkeys hurl rocks to attract prospective mates.

programme.title: Animals Like Us 1 - Lion Daycare Ep5
programme.desc: Discover why it takes a village to raise lion cubs in Kenya and sniff out the mating strategy of fragrant lemurs in Madagascar. Cut a rug at a honeybee dance party, then listen up as a forked-tailed drongo tricks other birds out of their dinner.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Partners Ep3
programme.desc: Meet a golden retriever that assuages anxiety and helps heal PTSD, a shepherd mix who rescues mudslide survivors, a pair of spaniels who sniff out underground water leaks, and a group of teachers pets in the UK that assist children learning to read.

programme.title: Dogs with Extraordinary Jobs 1 - The Protectors Ep4
programme.desc: A blind woman has found a new lease on life thanks to her canine running mate, a Jack Russell works as a super-nanny to a surprising array of species, and a team of dogs in Kenya are on daily patrol protecting endangered rhinos from poachers.

programme.desc: In Dunstable, John and his wife Helen demolish an old, dilapidated house and in its place build a million-pound, high-tech, accessible glass pavilion, complete with wildlife garden.

programme.desc: Something for Everyone - Rachel goes on a historical and spiritual journey to discover chocolate's universal appeal. Her enticing recipes include chewy, crunchy chocolate cookies.

programme.title: Donal's Asian Baking Adventure S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Melaka - In Melaka on Malaysia's South West Coast, Donal braves the Durian Puff! This snack is filled with the world's smelliest fruit which is hugely popular because once you bite into it, the sweet, creamy inside is very moreish.

programme.desc: Custard Week - It's custard week on The Great South African Bake Off and the bakers kick things off with a Franginpane Tart with Crme Anglaise. programme.desc: Paul attends a quinceaera birthday party in Baja California, tries fresh cactus in Milpa Alta and insects in Oaxaca, and visits one of Mexico's best restaurants on the Yucatn Peninsula.

programme.title: Gino's Italy: Secrets of the South S1 Ep5
programme.desc: Pollino, Basilicata - Gino explores the largest national park in Italy on horseback. This is the hilliest region where descendants of Albanian refugees from 500 years ago live in splendid isolation in the smallest village in Pollino National Park, San Paolo Albanese.

programme.title: Nigella's Cook, Eat, Repeat S1 Ep2
programme.desc: Nigella bakes a fluffy, white, no-knead bread, which she uses to sandwich her crispy fried chicken, accompanied by pickles and kimchi.

programme.title: Jamie Oliver: Cooking for Less S1 Ep3
programme.desc: Jamie demonstrates how to make an amazing pie using chicken thighs and canned mushroom soup; a sumptuous mushroom risotto and a veggie treat, a squash Bhaji burger and flatbread. Miguel Barclay shows us how to make a very low cost Aubergine Parmigiana.
